description: Lucy is a researcher for Shinsei Industries assigned to the http://anidb.net/ch48621 [YF-19] project. It is there that she meets the young and rough test pilot http://anidb.net/ch48619 [Isamu] who immediately attracts her by his roguish nature and the bold way he asked her out for a date. She unwittingly gets herself entangled in the bitter love triangle between http://anidb.net/ch48619 [Isamu] and his two ex best friends http://anidb.net/ch48624 [Myung Fang Lone] and http://anidb.net/ch48622 [Guld Goa Bowman].In the end she reluctantly relinquishes her hopes for a romantic relationship with http://anidb.net/ch48619 [Isamu].Source: wiki
name: Lucy Macmillan
